greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Table (read by rows) giving the coefficients of sum formulas of n-th Left factorials (A003422). The k-th row (k>=1) contains T(i,k) for i=1 to k+1, where k=[2*n+1+(-1)^(n-1)]/4 and T(i,k) satisfies !n = Sum_{i=1..k+1} T(i,k) * n^(k-i+1) / k!.
example: !7 = 874; substituting n=7 in the formula of the k-th row we obtain k=4 and the coefficients
results.author: _André F. Labossière_, Dec 17 2004
